body.name: Body-Solid Tools Treadmill Mat - 9ft Vinyl Cardio Mat for Rowers, Exercise Bike and Home Gym Equipment, Ideal for Carpet, Hardwood Floors and Concrete
features: INDUSTRY LEADER: For 30+ years, Body Solid has held the widest array of products designed to meet the demands of the ever-changing fitness industry (home gym, free weight machines, treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, weight plates, kettlebells, dumbbells, flooring, accessories and more). Our products are cutting edge and reliable and are built for Life……Your Life.

EXTRA THICK AND DURABLE: Body-Solid's treadmill mat is meticulously crafted with high-quality PVC materials, ensuring both durability and longevity. Its extra thickness is designed to withstand the weight and movement of your treadmill, bike, elliptical, or other gym equipment.

REDUCES NOISE AND VIBRATION: The Body-Solid Tools Rower Mat not only shields your floors but also diminishes noise and vibrations during your workouts, making it a perfect accessory for home gyms. This is particularly advantageous for individuals using treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, or other cardio equipment on hardwood floors or carpets.

VERSATILE AND EASY TO STORE: This mat is ideal for various exercise equipment like treadmills, bikes, and ellipticals, and it's effortlessly stored when not in use. Suitable for use on carpet, hardwood floors, and concrete, it offers versatility. Moreover, it's easy to clean, making it a practical and convenient addition to your home gym.

NON-SLIP SURFACE: Crafted at a convenient 9 feet in length, this resilient vinyl mat is specifically engineered to safeguard your floor. Its non-slip surface guarantees stability for your rower or treadmill during your workout. Dimensions are 102" x 36" x 0.13", and it weighs 8 lbs.
body.description: INDUSTRY LEADER: For 30+ years, Body Solid has held the widest array of products designed to meet the demands of the ever-changing fitness industry (home gym, free weight machines, treadmills, bikes, ellipticals, weight plates, kettlebells, dumbbells, flooring, accessories and more). Our products are cutting edge and reliable and are built for Life……Your Life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use this to hang a difficult item. Works perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have several mats for my exercise equipment. This one is thinner than I would have liked for under my rower but I kept it for some reason. It is holding up pretty well during its short use, and may be stronger than it looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for what it is.
reviews.reviewText: Matt is a little light weight and wrinkles horribly when I pull hard on my rower. I would glue it in place, but I’m renting right now.
